items.a: Buyers browse your catalog online, add items to their cart, and tap 'Send Order on WhatsApp'. This opens WhatsApp with a structured message listing everything they want — sizes, colours, quantities, and totals.

items.q: Do my buyers need to download an app?
items.a: No. Your catalog is a web page that works in any mobile browser. Buyers just open the link you share on WhatsApp.
Yes. Every shop's data is completely isolated. No other seller can see your products, orders, or customer information. We comply with POPIA (South Africa's data protection law).

items.q: Can I try it for free?
items.a: Absolutely. The Free plan lets you list up to 10 products with full WhatsApp checkout. No credit card required.

items.q: What payment methods do you accept?
items.a: We accept payments via PayFast — South Africa's trusted payment gateway. Pay with credit card, debit card, or EFT.

items.q: Can I import my existing product list?
items.a: Yes! Pro plan sellers can upload a CSV file to bulk-import hundreds of products at once.
TradeFeed is built in South Africa, for South Africa. We understand the Jeppe Street hustle.
Sign up, create your shop, upload your first product, and share your catalog link. It takes less than 5 minutes.
